title: Please Riot Make Clash Permanent
body:
I just finished my tournament and got third but I'll be honest that was the most fun I have had playing league in a while and would love it if I could play it more regularly. And this is me saying that as a OTP that gets banned every single clash. The scouting phase is exciting the champ select has so much yelling and the game itself is so tense because we are trying so hard, harder than I ever would in ranked because this matters so much more to most of us. This competitiveness makes noobs like us feel like pros and has once again made me fall in love with the game.
~~~~
I can't wait for tomorrow to try and get that first place

replies.body: ^ this. Im pretty sure the "beta" here (unlike betas for modes) isn't to determine _if_ we should make it permanent, but to make sure the game works when Clash is running :)

Nice. Competitive 5v5 completely removes the issue most players have with solo, the RNG teammates.  

Clash might be a good way to fix that issue. Y'all might want to run a poll at some point to find what % of your player base are folks like me who work non standard hours.  I would be a bit bummed out if the fact I don't do a 9-5 work week means I cant play the mode.

From the strain y'all have every time you do it thou I think you guys got a good deal of work ahead of yourself getting it out of beta. Good luck.

(Edit. Also round robins are great for Elo systems.)
